name: ImageS3
body:
ImageS3 is an Amazon S3-based image hosting service for developers. It is designed as SaaS to host and resize images for all your web and mobile applications in one place.


### Features
 * RESTful APIs.
 * Web-based management tool with live monitoring.
 * Manageable image thumbnail templates
 * All your app's images stored and managed in one place.
 * MongoDB for image metadata storage.
